Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1974...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1975, off John Teller (SHP)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/26/1975, off Andres Echeverria (NE)...
Traded from Plum Grove to West Texas on 6/8/1979 (Going to WT: 3B J. Calles. Going to PG: P R. Orme, P T. Soto)...
Drove in 6 runs against Longport on 8/4/1979...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Capital City on 8/4/1981...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (UBA) on 5/18/1983...
Injured on 8/14/1985 with a Broken Foot, out for 9 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Columbus on 8/31/1987...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Boston (UBA) on 9/23/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/12/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $2,845,948 per year...
